Notes: @Matt Daniels I've been digging for funny specific genres after hearing about people getting "10 hours of white noise" as their top Spotify Wrapped tracks. I added "specialized" when something is so specific it feels like we could call out it even if they only have a track or two that matches. Not sure how complicated that actually is to implement.
